alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lincoln County; South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 02 at 11:51AM MST until March 02 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West and northwest winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Lincoln County, South Central Mountains, and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Expect hazardous crosswinds. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lincoln County; South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County
